name: AQIA - EPINUTRIX Biomimetic Lipid Compound
description: AQIA offers EPINUTRIX, an innovative biomimetic lipid compound developed from D-Panthenol biofunctionalized with behenic acid and omega-9. This advanced ingredient stimulates the skin's natural processes to reinforce barrier function. The unique combination of panthenol and fatty acids provides both immediate and long-term barrier repair benefits.
notes: Innovative Brazilian ingredient supplier. EPINUTRIX represents a novel approach to barrier repair by combining panthenol with fatty acids. Stimulates natural skin processes rather than just providing external lipids. Excellent for advanced barrier repair formulations.
